text: Heritage of the Desert is a 1932 American western movie directed by Henry Hathaway and is based on the novel of the same name by Zane Grey and is the second version of the novel. It stars Randolph Scott, Sally Blane, J. Farrell MacDonald, David Landau and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1932 movies Category:1930s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Hathaway Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Heritage of the Desert (1932 movie)
